page.shortlink: api registry object sys create function
page.description: Create a new system setting (requires full registry path).

argument.name: name
argument.description: The registry entry name and full path.

argument.name: data
argument.description: The value to write into the Registry.

page.discussion: The REGISTRY.SYS_CREATE() method writes a zero terminated string value (type REG_SZ) into the Registry. This method is not limited to the Alpha Five section, as is REGISTRY.SAVE_SETTINGS(). The power of this function makes it dangerous to use. Make sure that you back up your Registry before making any changes.
